import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './time.scss' import MyTitle from '../../MyTitle/MyTitle' const Time = ({ darkMode }) => { const [time, setTime] = useState(new Date()) useEffect(() => { const interval = setInterval(() => setTime(new Date()), 1000) return () => clearInterval(interval) }) return (
Well well well !
Now on the clock
{time.toLocaleTimeString()}
Today we have
{time.toLocaleDateString()}
) } export default Time
